alert.note: Alert for Van Wert (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 09 at 2:44PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Patchy Frost Possible Tonight... Patchy frost will be possible tonight mainly in areas around and south of highway 30. The potential for winds to stay between 5 and 10 mph tonight as well as for areas of high clouds to be present provides a little bit more uncertainty with this event. However, the chance is there for especially outlying areas to see patchy frost where winds may relax below 5 mph and skies remain clear. Those with fragile plants and flowers that are susceptible will want to consider taking steps to protect them. This includes taking potted plants inside or covering plants that are in the ground.
